text:
Two sisters were arrested near Tiruthuraipoondi on the charge of snatching the gold chain of a woman passenger. When a bus from Thanjavur to Tiruthuraipoondi halted at Pandichatram, a woman passenger from Annapoorani (68) of Sembiamangalam shouted that somebody had stolen her gold chain. Immediately, the driver took the bus to Edaiyur police station where a check of passengers was conducted when it was found that her chain was taken away by Swathi (36) and Kannammal (32) of Aattayampatti near Salem. The stolen article was recovered. The sisters were arrested and the stolen chain was restored to Annapoorani.

Old man dies in road accident

An octogenarian riding a bicycle was killed in a road accident near Kudavasal on Sunday.

Police said Rajagopal (84) of Thirumeignanam near Kudavasal was riding a bicycle on the Kudavasal LF Road when a speeding truck hit him. He was rushed to a hospital where he succumbed to injuries. Further inquiries were under way.
title: Women passengers held for stealing chain
